Detailed Description

template<class DV, class Predicate>
struct DataModel_detail::Predwrapper< DV, Predicate, DataModel_detail::NoBase >

Predicate helper for DataVector/List classes (specialization).

This is specialized for the case where we're dealing with a base DataVector/List, and thus no casting is required.
